a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan:
The estimated annual number of deaths attributed to each
risk factor
. Estimates come with wide uncertainties,

especially for countries with poor
vital registration
.
Diet low in nuts and seeds
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)

Note:
Risk factors
are not mutually exclusive. The sum of deaths attributed to each risk factor can exceed the total number of deaths.
